channel.title: fun on udaypandey
channel.description: Recent content in fun on udaypandey

item.title: Gosaikunda trek
item.description: gosaikunda I went to Gosaikunda. Link to heading We had been planning to go there for about a month, and we finally did it. We started our journey on 14th April (Baisakh 1). The group consisted of Samir, Amrit, I. We took a bus from Buspark to Dhunche, Rasuwa. It took about 6 hours. We started our trek from Dhunche at 1 pm. On the first day, we walked 5 hours.

item.title: Swimming Day
item.description: swimming I went swimming with the boys. Link to heading And it was fun. I am quite new to swimming. I learned the basics four years ago with Dad. I was really happy to find out that I hadn’t forgotten much. I had my meal at home before 9 am and went to hostel. There I met Sachet and Amrit. Then we walked about 30 minutes to reach Marigold Party Palace, where Samir was already waiting for us.
